tool_description: Executes click actions on web elements with support for different click types, coordination, and interaction validation.

element_selector.description: CSS selector, ID, or XPath of the element to click

click_type.description: Type of click action (single, double, right, middle)

wait_before_click.description: Milliseconds to wait before executing click

force_click.description: Force click even if element is not visible or interactable

error_messages: Element not found: No element matches the provided selector
Element not clickable: Element is not visible or interactable
Invalid click type: Must be one of single, double, right, middle
Click action failed: Unable to execute click due to page state or element state
Invalid wait time: wait_before_click must be between 0 and 30000 milliseconds
usage: Provide element_selector to click an element. Optionally specify click_type, wait_before_click, and force_click. The tool validates element state and executes the click action with appropriate feedback.

click_executed.description: Whether the click action was successfully executed

element_state.description: State of the element before click (visible, hidden, disabled, etc.)

page_response.description: Summary of page response after click (navigation, modal, content change)
